name: Saucisson Chaud A La Lyonnaise
keywords: balsamic vinegar, pork sausage, russet potatoes, main course
recipeIngredient: Bouquet garni (1 sprig fresh thyme, 1 bay leaf, 1/2 bunch Italian parsley tied together in a leek leaf)
Salt, freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: In a saucepan, place the sausages, potatoes, bouquet garni, salt and peppercorns. Cover with cold water, bring to a boil and let simmer 30 minutes.

Remove the potatoes and the sausages from the pan. Peel and slice the potatoes and place in a salad bowl. Add the shallots, vinegar, olive oil, tarragon, chives and salt and pepper to taste. Toss well.
Arrange the potato salad on a serving platter. Slice the sausages and place on top. Sprinkle with fines herbes.
